remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 取得物件集合，此集合包含所發生變更的相關資訊。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that contains information about the changes that occurred.

value.span: 物件集合，包含所發生變更的相關資訊。

span.span: A collection of objects that contains information about the changes that occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有一個物件來控制每個連續的變更。There is one object for each consecutive change to the control. 多個連續的變更可能會在一個出現項目期間事件時變更需要變更基礎的文件的結構。More than one consecutive change can occur during one occurrence of the event when the change entails changing the structure of the underlying document. 例如，假設包含字串`"This is some text."`結構是`This is some text.`。For example, suppose that a contains the string `"This is some text."` The structure of the is `This is some text.`. 如果使用者會以粗體顯示的文字`"is some"`，基礎結構變為`This is some text.`。If the user bolds the words `"is some"`, the structure of the underlying changes to `This is some text.`. 沒有實際四個變更發生使用者動作的結果：There are actually four changes that took place as a result of the user's action: 1. ``符號會移除並重新加入詞彙之前`This`。The `` symbol is removed and re-added before the word `This`. 2. 符號``會加入這個字後面`This`。The symbols `` are added after the word `This`. 3. 符號``會加入這個字後面`some`。The symbols `` are added after the word `some`. 4. ``符號會移除並重新加入這個字後面`Text`。The `` symbol is removed and re-added after the word `Text`. 一般情況下，下列會一律是 true:In general, the following will always be true: - 所發生之變更會導致文件處於有效狀態。The changes that occur result in the document being in a valid state. - 集合會連續排列，與在控制項中發生變更。The collection is ordered consecutively, related to where the change occurred in the control. 例如，物件，代表位於位置 2 的變更是之前物件，代表發生變更的位置 10。For example, a object that represents a change at position 2 is before a object that represents a change at position 10. - 兩個物件不代表重疊的區域。Two objects do not represent an overlapping area. 值再加上的值之一物件一定會小於或等於值的下一個集合中的物件。The value of plus the value of of one object is always less than or equal to the value of of the next object in the collection. 同樣地，值再加上值的的其中一個物件一定會小於或等於值的下一個集合中的物件。Likewise, the value of plus the value of of one object is always less than or equal to the value of of the next object in the collection. - 集合會反映發生的變更，即使似乎那里任何淨變更。The collection reflects whatever changes occurred, even if there seems to be no net change. 在上述範例中，第一個或第四個變更都不會導致淨變更，因為每個只需移除再重新加入``和``分別符號。In the preceding example, neither the first or fourth change results in a net change, because each simply removed and re-added the `` and `` symbols, respectively. 但符號實際上已移除，並加入，因此它們會包含在集合中。But the symbols were actually removed and added, so they are included in the collection. 如果因為屬性變更，就會發生事件為空集合。If the event occurs as a result of a property change, is an empty collection. 在上述範例中，如果使用者會以粗體顯示整個字串，屬性設，但任何加入或移除文件，因此是空的。In the preceding example, if the user bolds the entire string, the property of the is set to , but nothing is added or removed from the document, so is empty. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
